casebody.data:
In the Matter of BCI COCA-COLA BOTTLING COMPANY OF LOS ANGELES, INC., Respondent/Appellant/Appellee/Cross-Appellee,
v.
Leonard HOSHIJO, in his official capacity as the Director, Department of Labor and Industrial Relations, State of Hawai'i; Department of Labor and Industrial Relations, State of Hawai'i, Appellees/Appellees/Cross-Appellants,
and
Tammy L. Josue, Complainant/ Appellee/Appellant/Cross-Appellee NO. CAAP-14-0001135 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. September 28, 2018

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Affirmed.
